query.value:
<fetch version="1.0"
       mapping="logical"
       distinct="true"
       savedqueryid="41c7362d-ac5a-ed11-9562-000d3aba35c5"
       no-lock="false">
	<entity name="crd3c_uowarehouses">
		<attribute name="statecode"/>
		<attribute name="crd3c_uowarehousesid"/>
		<attribute name="crd3c_name"/>
		<attribute name="crd3c_dataarea"/>
		<filter type="and">
			<condition attribute="statecode"
			           operator="eq"
			           value="0"/>
			<condition attribute="hso_dualpurpose"
			           operator="eq"
			           value="1"/>
			<condition attribute="crd3c_warehousetype"
			           operator="eq"
			           value="STOCK"/>
			<condition attribute="hso_ordertypesplit"
			           operator="eq"
			           value="1"/>
		</filter>
	</entity>
</fetch>

dataflow.referenceName: Sync MSL based on forecast sales

</fetch>

properties.description: Lookup activity, array of companies, Dataverse query taking in the array.

scriptLines: query: (concat('<fetch version="1.0" mapping="logical" no-lock="false" distinct="true"><entity name="crd3c_uoitem"><attribute name="crd3c_uoitemid"/><attribute name="crd3c_name"/><attribute name="crd3c_simpleid"/><attribute name="crd3c_variantname"/><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea"/><attribute name="crd3c_barcode"/><attribute name="crd3c_size"/><attribute name="crd3c_productnumber"/><filter type="and"><condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/><condition attribute="crd3c_dataarea" operator="in">',$companyFetchXML,' </condition></filter></entity></fetch>')),

query: ('<fetch version="1.0" mapping="logical" distinct="true" savedqueryid="41c7362d-ac5a-ed11-9562-000d3aba35c5" no-lock="false"><entity name="crd3c_uowarehouses"><attribute name="statecode"/><attribute name="crd3c_uowarehousesid"/><attribute name="crd3c_name"/><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea"/><filter type="and"><condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/><condition attribute="hso_dualpurpose" operator="eq" value="1"/><condition attribute="crd3c_warehousetype" operator="eq" value="STOCK"/><condition attribute="hso_ordertypesplit" operator="eq" value="1"/></filter></entity></fetch>')) ~> UOWarehouses

ForecastSales filter(equals(suntafforecastchannelid, "D2CE") && equals(modelid, "D2CE model") && equals(custgroupid, "zD2CE") && (salesqty != 0) && toString(toDate(toString(startdate))) == '2025-12-16'  && in($CompanyList, dataareaid)) ~> filterModelCustGroupChannel

query: (concat('<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"><entity name="crd3c_orderqties"><attribute name="crd3c_orderqtiesid" /><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea" /><attribute name="crd3c_site" /><attribute name="crd3c_name" /><attribute name="crd3c_itemvariant" /><attribute name="crd3c_quantity" /><attribute name="crd3c_barcode" /><attribute name="createdon" /><order attribute="crd3c_name" descending="false" /><filter type="and"><condition attribute="crd3c_site" operator="eq" value="',$Store,'" /></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> RecommendedOrderQty

MinOrderUpperDataArea filter((MinOrderQty > 0) && (equals(upper(dataarea) , upper($Company)) || equals(upper($Company) , "ALL") ) && (equals(crd3c_site , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL"))) ~> filterMinOrderQty

ItemSize filter(((equals(ItemSize@INVENTLOCATIONID , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL")) || (equals(ItemSize@INVENTLOCATIONID , upper($Warehouse))  ||  equals(upper($Warehouse) , "ALL")))) ~> filter1

transformations.name: filterJoinInventSum
transformations.description: Filtering rows using expressions on columns 'AVAILPHYSICAL, ORDERED, MinOrderQty' + hso_FTS

scriptLines: query: (concat('<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true" savedqueryid="b616874b-dc9e-ec11-b400-000d3ab75270" no-lock="false"><entity name="crd3c_orderqties"><attribute name="crd3c_orderqtiesid"/><attribute name="crd3c_site"/><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea"/><attribute name="crd3c_itemvariant"/><attribute name="crd3c_name"/><attribute name="createdon"/><attribute name="modifiedon"/><attribute name="crd3c_quantity"/><attribute name="crd3c_variantname"/><attribute name="crd3c_barcode"/><attribute name="hso_size"/><order attribute="crd3c_dataarea" descending="false"/><order attribute="crd3c_site" descending="false"/><order attribute="hso_size" descending="false"/><attribute name="hso_fts"/><filter type="and"><condition attribute="crd3c_site" operator="eq" value="',$Store,'"/><condition attribute="crd3c_dataarea" operator="eq" value="',$Company,'"/><filter type="or"><condition attribute="crd3c_quantity" operator="gt" value="0"/><condition attribute="hso_fts" operator="gt" value="0"/></filter></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> RecommendedOrderQtySample
derivedColumn5 filter(iif($isDualPurposeStore, coalesce(AVAILPHYSICAL,0), coalesce(AVAILPHYSICAL,0) + coalesce(ORDERED,0)) < MinOrderQty) ~> filterJoinInventSum

MinOrderUpperDataArea filter((equals(upper(dataarea) , upper($Company)) || equals(upper($Company) , "ALL") ) && (equals(crd3c_site , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL"))) ~> filterMinOrderQty

ItemSize filter(((equals(ItemSize@INVENTLOCATIONID , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL")) || (equals(ItemSize@INVENTLOCATIONID , upper($Warehouse))  ||  equals(upper($Warehouse) , "ALL")))) ~> filter1

query: (concat('<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"><entity name="crd3c_orderqties"><attribute name="crd3c_orderqtiesid" /><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea" /><attribute name="crd3c_site" /><attribute name="crd3c_name" /><attribute name="crd3c_itemvariant" /><attribute name="crd3c_quantity" /><attribute name="crd3c_barcode" /><attribute name="createdon" /><order attribute="crd3c_name" descending="false" /><filter type="and"><condition attribute="crd3c_site" operator="eq" value="',$Store,'" /></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> RecommendedOrderQty

transformations.name: filterJoinInventSum
transformations.description: Filtering rows using expressions on columns 'AVAILPHYSICAL, ORDERED, MinOrderQty' + hso_FTS

scriptLines: query: (concat('<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"><entity name="crd3c_orderqties"><attribute name="crd3c_orderqtiesid"/><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea"/><attribute name="crd3c_site"/><attribute name="crd3c_name"/><attribute name="crd3c_itemvariant"/><attribute name="crd3c_quantity"/><attribute name="crd3c_barcode"/><attribute name="createdon"/><attribute name="hso_fts"/><order attribute="crd3c_name" descending="false"/><filter type="and"><condition attribute="crd3c_site" operator="eq" value="',$Store,'"/></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> RecommendedOrderQty
derivedColumn5 filter(iif($isDualPurposeStore, coalesce(AVAILPHYSICAL,0), coalesce(AVAILPHYSICAL,0) + coalesce(ORDERED,0)) < MSL + FreeToSell) ~> filterJoinInventSum

MinOrderUpperDataArea filter((MSL > 0 || FreeToSell > 0) && (equals(upper(dataarea) , upper($Company)) || equals(upper($Company) , "ALL") ) && (equals(crd3c_site , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL"))) ~> filterMinOrderQty

MinOrderUpperDataArea filter((MSL > 0 || FreeToSell > 0) && (equals(upper(dataarea) , upper($Company)) || equals(upper($Company) , "ALL") ) && (equals(crd3c_site , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL"))) ~> filterMinOrderQty

scriptLines: query: (concat('<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"><entity name="crd3c_orderqties"><attribute name="crd3c_orderqtiesid"/><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea"/><attribute name="crd3c_site"/><attribute name="crd3c_name"/><attribute name="crd3c_itemvariant"/><attribute name="crd3c_quantity"/><attribute name="crd3c_barcode"/><attribute name="createdon"/><attribute name="hso_fts"/><order attribute="crd3c_name" descending="false"/><filter type="and"><condition attribute="crd3c_site" operator="eq" value="',$Store,'"/></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> RecommendedOrderQty
derivedColumn5 filter(iif($isDualPurposeStore, coalesce(AVAILPHYSICAL,0), coalesce(AVAILPHYSICAL,0) + coalesce(ORDERED,0)) < MinOrderQty) ~> filterJoinInventSum

MinOrderUpperDataArea filter((MinOrderQty > 0) && (equals(upper(dataarea) , upper($Company)) || equals(upper($Company) , "ALL") ) && (equals(crd3c_site , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL"))) ~> filterMinOrderQty
selectMinOrderQty derive(MinOrderQty = iif($isDualPurposeStore, coalesce(MSL,0) + coalesce(FreeToSell,0), coalesce(MSL,0)),

ItemSize filter(((equals(ItemSize@INVENTLOCATIONID , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL")) || (equals(ItemSize@INVENTLOCATIONID , upper($Warehouse))  ||  equals(upper($Warehouse) , "ALL")))) ~> filter1
UOWarehouses filter(or(upper(crd3c_warehousetype) == 'STORE' && statecode == 0,  upper(crd3c_warehousetype) == "STOCK" && hso_dualpurpose)) ~> filterWarehouse

ForecastSales filter(equals(suntafforecastchannelid, "D2CE") && equals(modelid, "D2CE model") && equals(custgroupid, "zD2CE") && (salesqty != 0) && toDate(toString(startdate)) == addDays(currentDate(),1)) ~> filterModelCustGroupChannel
UOWarehouses filter(upper(crd3c_warehousetype) == "STOCK" && hso_dualpurpose == true() && statecode == 0) ~> GetDualPurposeStores

query: (concat('<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"><entity name="crd3c_orderqties"><attribute name="crd3c_orderqtiesid" /><attribute name="crd3c_dataarea" /><attribute name="crd3c_site" /><attribute name="crd3c_name" /><attribute name="crd3c_itemvariant" /><attribute name="crd3c_quantity" /><attribute name="crd3c_barcode" /><attribute name="createdon" /><order attribute="crd3c_name" descending="false" /><filter type="and"><condition attribute="crd3c_site" operator="eq" value="',$Store,'" /><condition attribute="crd3c_dataarea" operator="eq" value="',$Company,'" /></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> RecommendedOrderQty

ItemSize filter((equals(ItemSize@DATAAREAID , upper($Company)) || equals(upper($Company) , "ALL") ) && ((equals(ItemSize@INVENTLOCATIONID , upper($Store))  ||  equals(upper($Store) , "ALL"))

query: '<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="crd3c_legalentities">
    <attribute name="crd3c_legalentitiesid" />
    <attribute name="crd3c_legalentity" />
    <attribute name="crd3c_description" />
    <order attribute="crd3c_legalentity" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>') ~> LegalEntity

query: '<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="hso_vendors">
    <attribute name="hso_vendorsid" />
    <attribute name="hso_name" />
    <attribute name="hso_company" />
    <order attribute="hso_name" descending="false" />
  </entity>
</fetch>') ~> Vendors
Vendors, selectVendors exists(hso_name == ACCOUNTNUM && upper (hso_company) == upper(DATAAREAID),

ForecastSales filter(equals(suntafforecastchannelid, "D2CE") && equals(modelid, "D2CE model") && equals(custgroupid, "zD2CE") && (salesqty != 0) && toString(toDate(toString(startdate))) == '2025-12-16'  && dataareaid == 'onuk') ~> filter1

scriptLines:
query: '<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="crd3c_uowarehouses">
    <attribute name="crd3c_uowarehousesid" />
    <attribute name="crd3c_name" />
    <attribute name="crd3c_warehousetype" />
    <order attribute="crd3c_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="or">
      <condition attribute="crd3c_warehousetype" operator="eq" value="Store" />
       <condition attribute="crd3c_warehousetype" operator="eq" value="Stock" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>') ~> UOWarehouses

properties.description: Get a file based on vendors input
